course_title: Special Topics in Biology: Anatomy & Physiology with Lab
class_notes: There will be a new faculty hire for this course.    Course will be scheduled once new faculty member is hired.  This course will NOT count for the Biology major. Students must enroll in both lecture and lab.
course_description: A course on topics of special biological interest, designed for Biology majors elective credit. This course is repeatable when the topic varies.
prerequisites: (BIOL 142 and BIOL 142L) or BIOL_OX 142WE or equivalent transfer credit as a prerequisite.
sections: Class Nbr: This section is full 4456, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: Does Not Meet, Instructor: Staff, Status: Closed
